Text: Cirque du Soleil back in Houston on January Four years ago we went to a performance of Cirque du Soleil in tent on the Astrodome parking lot Cirque du Soleil is coming back to Houston early next year See the message below to get advance tickets Were going Richard Laura Riehm oustonRRcom Original Message From To Sent Tuesday October PM Subject Dralion opens in Houston on January Bonjour Laura Cirque du SoleilT will finally be back in town After a fouryear absence the cast of Dralion will begin performances in Houston on January Our trademark blueandyellow Big Top which can fit over people will be set up across from the George R Brown Convention Center AMEX CARD HOLDERS ADVANCE TICKETS As American Express is the official sponsor of the tour its cardholders may obtain tickets by calling AMEX or online at the ticket link below starting October DRALION CLUB MEMBERS ADVANCE TICKETS On October we will send you an email with an exclusive link allowing you to purchase tickets before they go on sale to the general public GENERAL PUBLIC TICKETS Tickets will be available to the general public on October through the Admission Network at or online at the ticket link below Ticket info linkaspuamexonsalechousa Thank you for your interest in Cirque du Soleil and for being a member of the Dralion Internet Club Au revoir Dralion Club staff Cirque du Soleil You are receiving this email because you have requested to be included in our mailing list If for any reason you wish to cancel your Dralion Internet Club membership you can do so at membercancelaspemail ousto nrrcom To modify your membership or update your email options go to membermodifyaspemail ousto nrrcom Copyright c by Cirque du Soleil Inc All rights reserved
